QuestData.Title: Hezrul Bloodmark
QuestData.Description: Hezrul Bloodmark is the leader of the Kolkar centaurs in the Barrens. He is fierce, brutal and cunning. Defeating him would disrupt and fracture the Kolkars, greatly reducing their threat to us.$B$BSo kill him. Bring me Hezrul's Head, and I will mount it from this outpost, so that they may know fear.$B$BHezrul leads his people from the Lushwater Oasis, to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Hezrul Bloodmark and collect his head.
QuestData.RewardText: I commend you, $n. These centaur are undisciplined and cannot focus their rage as the orcs can, but they are fierce nonetheless. In defeating them, your valor is proven.
